title: Window Shade, 2009-17-2, 1938–39
provenance: Gift of Doris Duke Charitable Foundation; window shade was one of six commissioned by Doris Duke for theatre in Hollywood Wing at Duke Farms. Shades were de-installed from the Duke Farms Theatre and delivered directly to Cooper-Hewitt,
dimensions:
L x W x D: 518.2 x 162.6 cm (17 ft. x 5 ft. 4 in.)
L x W: 408.9 x 166.4 cm (13 ft. 5 in. x 5 ft. 5 1/2 in.)
creditline: Gift of Doris Duke Charitable Foundation
description: Large central male figure surrounded by architecture with onion-like cupolas, peacock, stringed instrument. Horse-drawn cart at bottom, fish under man's foot, bowl of caviar.
